cards: Would you rather know how you die or when you die?
Would you rather lose all memories or never make new ones?
Would you rather be able to fly or read minds?
Would you rather live without music or without movies?
Would you rather always be too hot or too cold?
Would you rather have unlimited money or unlimited time?
Would you rather explore space or the ocean depths?
Would you rather never use social media or never watch TV?
Would you rather be famous or have a close group of friends?
Would you rather know all languages or play every instrument?
Would you rather travel to the past or the future?
Would you rather have no privacy or no freedom?
Would you rather be incredibly smart or extremely attractive?
Would you rather live without internet or without heating?
Would you rather have a rewind button or a pause button for life?
Would you rather always say what you think or never speak?
Would you rather change the past or see the future?
Would you rather be invisible or be able to fly?
Would you rather live forever or die tomorrow?
Would you rather have true love or win the lottery?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have the ability to teleport or time travel?
Would you rather never eat your favorite food again or only eat that forever?
Would you rather give up coffee or social media?
Would you rather be able to talk to animals or speak all human languages?
Would you rather have unlimited travel or unlimited food?
Would you rather lose the ability to read or the ability to speak?
Would you rather be stuck in traffic or stuck in a long line?
Would you rather never have to sleep or never have to eat?
Would you rather know when you're going to die or how you're going to die?
